doubleOptIn.subject: Welcome to IntelliZoom Panel
doubleOptIn.title: Hi {{user.name}}, welcome to IntelliZoom Panel!
doubleOptIn.bodyCopy:
Please click on the button below to activate your account.
For security reasons this link will expire in 24 hours or once it's used.

reset.subject: Password reset request
reset.title: Forgot your password?
reset.bodyCopy:
It's ok, we all do from time to time.



Just click on the button below to set a new password and that's it. If you didn't make this request, please ignore this email. For security reasons this link will expire in 24 hours or once it's used.

registeredTwice.subject: Someone just tried to register to IntelliZoom Panel using your email
registeredTwice.title: Someone just tried to register to IntelliZoom Panel using your email
registeredTwice.bodyCopy:
Was it you? Well in that case, just $t(izpanel.emails.registeredtwice.logIn). If you can't remember your password, you could $t(izpanel.emails.registeredtwice.updatePassword).
If it was not you, please ignore this email, we've got your back.

studyInvitation.subject: There's a new study available for you!
studyInvitation.title: Hey {{user.name}}, there's a new study available for you!
studyInvitation.bodyCopy: Are you ready to give your feedback?

studyComplete.subject: We have received your study participation
studyComplete.title: Thanks for sharing your thoughts!
studyComplete.bodyCopy:
We will review your participation in the study {{campaignID}} asap and proceed to send you the payment within 21 business days.
If you have any further questions, please $t(izpanel.emails.common.contact) or visit our $t(izpanel.emails.common.help).

paymentSent.subject: Your payment has been sent
paymentSent.title: Hey {{useuser.namerName}}, your payment has been sent!

paymentConfirmation.subject: Your payment has arrived!
paymentConfirmation.title: Hey {{user.name}}, PayPal has just confirmed us that your payment has been received

certificationApproved.subject: You did great in your practice study!
certificationApproved.title: Hey {{user.name}}, awesome job on your practice study!
certificationApproved.bodyCopy:
We see that you can clearly articulate your thoughts and experience. You're exactly the kind of panelist we hoped for!
You will now receive invitations to Think Out Loud and Card Sort studies as well. These type of studies are better paid generally ;)
If you have any further questions, please $t(izpanel.emails.common.contact) or visit our $t(izpanel.emails.common.help).

certificationRejected.subject: Your practice study was not approved
certificationRejected.title: Hi {{user.name}}, the practice study that you sent us was not approved
certificationRejected.bodyCopy:
We’re sorry to inform you that the practice study you submitted did not meet the quality requirements we demand for a Think Out Loud or Card Sort study.
If you think this is a mistake or you would like a second shot, $t(izpanel.emails.common.contact) and we'll be happy to reactivate the practice study for you.
If you have any further questions, please $t(izpanel.emails.common.contact) or visit our $t(izpanel.emails.common.help).
